021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.AccountStatus;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.sponge.impl.SpongeCMDSource;
025import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Command;
026import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Default;
027import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Description;
028import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Subcommand;
029import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Usage;
030import revxrsal.commands.sponge.actor.SpongeCommandActor;
031import revxrsal.commands.sponge.annotation.CommandPermission;
032
033/**
034 * AdminCommand
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 0.1.2.0
038 */
039@Command({ "tne", "ecomin", "ecoadmin", "ecomanage", "theneweconomy" })
040@Description("#{Admin.Main.Description}")
041public class AdminCommand {
042
043  //@DefaultFor({ "tne", "ecomin", "ecoadmin", "ecomanage", "theneweconomy" })
044  @Subcommand({ "ecomenu", "menu", "myeco", "ecomenu" })
045  @Usage("#{Admin.MyEco.Arguments}")
046  @Description("#{Admin.MyEco.Description}")
047  @CommandPermission("tne.money.myeco")
048  public void onMyEco(final SpongeCommandActor sender) {
049
050    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onMyEco(new SpongeCMDSource(sender));
051  }
052
053  @Subcommand({ "backup", "archive" })
054  @Usage("#{Admin.Backup.Arguments}")
055  @Description("#{Admin.Backup.Description}")
056  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.backup")
057  public void backup(final SpongeCommandActor sender) {
058
059    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onBackup(new SpongeCMDSource(sender));
060  }
061
062  @Subcommand({ "create", "add", "new", "make", "+" })
063  @Usage("#{Admin.Create.Arguments}")
064  @Description("#{Admin.Create.Description}")
065  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.create")
066  public void create(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final String name) {
067
068    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onCreate(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), name);
069  }
070
071  @Subcommand({ "debug" })
072  @Usage("#{Admin.Debug.Arguments}")
073  @Description("#{Admin.Debug.Description}")
074  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.debug")
075  public void debug(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final DebugLevel level) {
076
077    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onDebug(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), level);
078  }
079
080  @Subcommand({ "delete", "destroy", "del", "remove", "-" })
081  @Usage("#{Admin.Delete.Arguments}")
082  @Description("#{Admin.Delete.Description}")
083  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.delete")
084  public void delete(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final String name) {
085
086    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onDelete(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), name);
087  }
088
089  @Subcommand({ "extract" })
090  @Usage("#{Admin.Extract.Arguments}")
091  @Description("#{Admin.Extract.Description}")
092  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.extract")
093  public void extract(final SpongeCommandActor sender) {
094
095    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onExtract(new SpongeCMDSource(sender));
096  }
097
098  @Subcommand({ "purge" })
099  @Usage("#{Admin.Purge.Arguments}")
100  @Description("#{Admin.Purge.Description}")
101  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.purge")
102  public void purge(final SpongeCommandActor sender) {
103
104    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onPurge(new SpongeCMDSource(sender));
105  }
106
107  @Subcommand({ "reload" })
108  @Usage("#{Admin.Reload.Arguments}")
109  @Description("#{Admin.Reload.Description}")
110  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.reload")
111  public void reload(final SpongeCommandActor sender, @Default("all") final String type) {
112
113    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onReload(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), type);
114  }
115
116  @Subcommand({ "reloaddb" })
117  @Usage("Admin.ReloadDB.Arguments")
118  @Description("Admin.ReloadDB.Description")
119  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.reloaddb")
120  public void reloadDB(final SpongeCommandActor sender) {
121
122    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onReloadDB(new SpongeCMDSource(sender));
123  }
124
125  @Subcommand({ "reset", "nuke" })
126  @Usage("#{Admin.Reset.Arguments}")
127  @Description("#{Admin.Reset.Description}")
128  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.reset")
129  public void reset(final SpongeCommandActor sender) {
130
131    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onReset(new SpongeCMDSource(sender));
132  }
133
134  @Subcommand({ "restore" })
135  @Usage("#{Admin.Restore.Arguments}")
136  @Description("#{Admin.Restore.Description}")
137  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.restore")
138  public void restore(final SpongeCommandActor sender, @Default("0") final int extraction) {
139
140    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onRestore(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), extraction);
141  }
142
143  @Subcommand({ "save" })
144  @Usage("#{Admin.Save.Arguments}")
145  @Description("#{Admin.Save.Description}")
146  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.save")
147  public void save(final SpongeCommandActor sender) {
148
149    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onSave(new SpongeCMDSource(sender));
150  }
151
152  @Subcommand({ "status" })
153  @Usage("#{Admin.Status.Arguments}")
154  @Description("#{Admin.Status.Description}")
155  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.status")
156  public void status(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final Account account, @Default("normal") final AccountStatus status) {
157
158    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onStatus(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), account, status);
159  }
160
161  @Subcommand({ "version", "ver", "build" })
162  @Usage("#{Admin.Version.Arguments}")
163  @Description("#{Admin.Version.Description}")
164  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.version")
165  public void version(final SpongeCommandActor sender) {
166
167    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onVersion(new SpongeCMDSource(sender));
168  }
169}
